name: Dark yourtv.com.au cleaned up to just the guide
description:
Based on "yourtv.com.au cleaned up to just the guide" by bbz. I loved how clean it was, he did a very good job, but it was very bright compared to every other page I view. I darkened it to match the rest of my websites.

Just like the style I based it on, it only affects the actual guide. The pop-up show descriptions should be readable.
